page.title: 05WOLVERLEY SEBRIGHT 1ST.SCH.
page.content: Wolverley Sebright First School was built in{1926}.It is a{Voluntary Aided school and was originally endowed by {Wiiliam Sebright.} The school is for children aged between{5 and 9 years. There are{4 teachers}, including the Headteacher and{91}children (July 1985).The Head is{Mr.Stout}and the other teachers are{Mrs.Cutts (Deputy), {Mrs.Needham }and{Mrs.Allan}. The school also has a secretary, caretaker,two dinner ladies, an ancillary and a school crossing patrol. There is a{School Association for parents,staff and friends of the school.
